#define DZ_ASSERT_CAST(dzBase, className)   DzAssertCast<className>(dzBase)

Detailed Description

Defines the DzBase class.

Define Documentation

#define DZ_ASSERT_CAST (   dzBase,
  className 
)    DzAssertCast<className>(dzBase)

Macro for casting DzBase pointers to the given subclass using the DzBase::assertCast() function.

Parameters:
dzBase A DzBase pointer to be cast to the given subclass. NULL pointers are ignored, and passed straight through without throwing an exception.
className The name of the class to cast the pointer to.
